attributes.action: #cecilthelion Stop hunters.... Fine or jail these people killing for sport!
attributes.additional_details: We want it made law that anyone killing innocent animals for sport are punished!
attributes.background: Don't let Cecil die for no reason

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105335

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
